TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ValueChangedHandler(object o, ValueChangedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ValueChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ValueChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ValueChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ValueChangedHandler is removed from the event.
